summary: This bill amends Title 38 of the United States Code to address veteran exposure to radiation and toxins at the Nevada Test and Training Range. It establishes a presumption that veterans who served at specified locations and timeframes at the Range were exposed to such hazards. This presumption aims to simplify the process for veterans seeking treatment for disabilities related to this exposure, specifically for conditions like lipomas and tumors. The bill defines “covered locations” within the Nevada Test and Training Range, excluding Nellis and Creech Air Force Bases.
